synopsis.text:
The story follows Satoru Mikami, an ordinary 37-year-old corporate worker from Tokyo, who finds solace in his mundane life but yearns for a romantic partner. Tragedy strikes when he is randomly stabbed during an outing with a colleague, leading to his untimely demise. However, Satoru's journey doesn't end there, as he awakens in a mysterious world reincarnated as a slime named Rimuru.

In this new form, Rimuru discovers extraordinary abilities, such as dissolving other creatures to acquire their skills. While exploring a cave, he encounters a powerful sealed dragon named Veldora. Forming an unlikely bond, Rimuru vows to help free Veldora, who in return grants him divine protection and the name Rimuru Tempest.

As Rimuru ventures into this diverse world inhabited by various races, he decides to establish a peaceful village where all are welcome. Along the way, he meets Shizue Izawa, a woman who was summoned to this world by the demon king as a child. Unbeknownst to Rimuru, this encounter will significantly impact his destiny.

Join Rimuru Tempest on his thrilling adventure as he navigates through this strange world, befriends extraordinary beings, and creates a haven for all races.
